text: Nomuli gei Jehoiada ga haga ulu Joash gi daha, gaa dugu di hau king gi hongo dono libogo, gaa wanga gi mee di beebaa o nia haganoho i nnangahaihai o nia king. Gei Joash gaa hai di king. Jehoiada tangada hai mee dabu mo ana dama daane gu hagatulu Joash, gei nia daangada ga wwolowwolo gi nua boloo, “Di king gi mouli hua beelaa!”
